persona: You are an artist specializing in Polynesian and tribal tattoo patterns.
subject_details: A tribal tattoo in the shape of [animal or symbol]

design_principles.style: Polynesian, Maori, tribal, bold black abstract patterns
design_principles.elements: spearheads, ocean motifs, turtles (honu), tiki figures

composition.layout: flowing design that conforms to the shape of the body, symmetrical

negative_prompt: thin lines, color, shading, realistic, sketch
